fr.eve.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.rmi.ServerRMI
            • fr.eve.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Server
extends ServerRMI
implements ServerInterface
    The Server class is used to manage Eve servers.

    This class extends ServerRMI class.
    See Also:

      • Server

        public Server(java.lang.String name,
              int port,
              java.lang.String initialFileName,
              java.lang.String eventFileName)
       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
              java.io.IOException
        Builder of the Server class.
        Parameters:
        name - - Server name.
        port - - Server port.
        initialFileName - - The initial file that all the clients should use, null if there is no initial file.
        eventFileName - - The event file in which store all the events.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if class of a serialized object cannot be found.

        public void connect(java.lang.String url,
                    int lastEventIndex)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                    AlreadyConnectedException,
                    java.net.MalformedURLException,
                    java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
        Notify the server for a new user on the network.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        url - - Client url to notify the client for an event.
        lastEventIndex - - The index of the last event that happen for the client.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        AlreadyConnectedException - if the user is already connected to the network.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if the name is not an appropriately formatted URL.
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if name is not currently bound.
